name: SoundMindz
overview:
At SoundMindzâ„¢, we are singularly focused on providing the latest in Online, On-Demand Mental Health Services.

For Therapists: Our Platform enables “Virtual Offices” including online therapy sessions, group sessions, videos, Directory listings; referrals and triage; and tools for tracking mental health.

For patients: Our Platform offers self-diagnostic tests (online); research and information; and cross platform smart phone Apps for managing mental health.

For Companies: Our Platform reduces healthcare costs by supplying a triage Platform.

We are a site developed by Doctors and Therapists, and focused on global mental Health exclusively.

milestones.description: SoundMindz now offering Video Therapy Sessions featuring prominent psychologist Dr. Ciaramicoli

SoundMindz.Org is now offering an online eBook publishing platform.
First work book published will be an Anxiety Management book; tied to a smart phone APP being launched shortly.
